title: Update Failed check logs. at 3%
body:
I haven't played league in a week or two and came back totally expecting a patch, which is cool, but it keeps failing. It takes a while to get to three percent (not thirty-three percent like I have seen others post so it's not connection.) then it just says it fails and to check the logs. Not sure what to do, I'd quit playing, but I do have money still left in my account and I doubt yall have any interest in failing me. I like you Riot, but HELP! or anyone else reading this would be great. 

please, of course, :D

Tanner

replies.body: Is it an unspecified error?  I'm also curious if you're still on the legacy client.  This kind of issue can happen if your OS security settings or anti virus is acting a bit overzealous.  You'll want to go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up.  I hope that helps!
